com.mongodb

类 DefaultDBEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bson.BasicBSONEncoder
      • com.mongodb.DefaultDBEncoder
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    DBEncoder, BSONEncoder

    public class DefaultDBEncoder
extends BasicBSONEncoder
implements DBEncoder
    The default BSON encoder for BSONObject instances.

      • writeObject

        public int writeObject(OutputBuffer outputBuffer,
                       BSONObject document)
        从接口复制的说明: DBEncoder
        Encode the BSONObject.
        指定者:
        writeObject 在接口中 DBEncoder
        参数:
        outputBuffer - the OutputBuffer to write to
        document - the BSONObject to write
        返回:
        the number of characters in the encoding

      • putSpecial

        protected boolean putSpecial(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.Object value)
        从类复制的说明: BasicBSONEncoder
        Special values are not encoded into documents.
        覆盖:
        putSpecial 在类中 BasicBSONEncoder
        参数:
        name - the field name
        value - the value
        返回:
        true if the operation is successful. This implementation always returns false.

      • putDBRef

        Deals with encoding database references.
        参数:
        name - the name of the field in the document
        ref - the database reference object
